properties.description: IMS Information Asset curated view for PBI reports

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                 FROM    sys.schemas
                 WHERE   name = 'miPINS' )
     EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [miPINS]');
 GO

 --CREATE VIEW FOR IMS Information Asset PBI Report

 CREATE OR ALTER VIEW miPINS.vw_mipins_IMS_InformationAsset
 AS

 SELECT
	IMSInformationAssetID                                                                AS [information_asset_id],
	INformationAssetIDLegacy                                                             AS [information_asset_parent_id],
	InformationAssetName                                                                 AS [information_asset_name],
	InformationAssetPrimaryBusinessArea                                                  AS [primary_business_area],
	InformationAssetLocation                                                             AS [location],
	InformationAssetContractedService                                                    AS [is_contracted_service],
	InformationAssetRegion                                                               AS [region],
	InformationAssetPurpose                                                              AS [purpose],
	InformationAssetFinancialValue                                                       AS [financial_value],
	InformationAssetBusinessCritically                                                   AS [business_criticality],
	InformationAssetDataDisposalRoutine                                                  AS [data_disposal_routine],
	InformationAssetLastCurrentAccurateDate                                              AS [last_current_and_accurate_date],
	InformationAssetReviewPeriod                                                         AS [review_period_days],
	InformationAssetUserLicenses                                                         AS [user_licences],
	InformationAssetSuperUserLicenses                                                    AS [superuser_licences],
	InformationAssetSysAdminLicenses                                                     AS [sys_admin_licences],
	InformationAssetInfoSecRiskRegister                                                  AS [infosec_risk_register],
	InformationAssetCustodian                                                            AS [custodian],
	InformationAssetDateLastDrCheck                                                      AS [date_of_last_dr_check],
	InformationAssetBackUpLocation                                                       AS [backup_location],
	InformationAssetDrCheckFrequency                                                     AS [dr_check_frequency],
	InformationAssetBackupFrequency                                                      AS [backup_frequency],
	InformationAssetFormatList                                                           AS [asset_format_list_c],
	InformationAssetManagementRegister                                                   AS [management_register_text],
	InformationAssetSoftwareVersion                                                      AS [software_version],
	InformationAssetAccessControlMethod                                                  AS [access_control_method],
	InformformationAssetBackUpRequired                                                   AS [backup_required],
	InformationAssetDecommissionDate                                                     AS [decommision_date],
	InformationAssetDrTestRequired                                                       AS [dr_test_required],
	InformationAssetEncryptionAtRest                                                     AS [encryption_at_rest],
	InformationAssetsIMSInformationAssetsName1                                           AS [ims_information_assets_ims_information_assets_1_name],
	InformationAssetsida                                                                 AS [ims_inform2f55_assets_ida],
	InformationAssetStatus                                                               AS [status],
	InformationAssetDateModified                                                         AS [date_modified],
	InformationAssetDateNextReview                                                       AS [date_of_next_review],
	REPLACE(InformationAssetOwner, ''', '''')                                       AS [product_manager_or_business_owner],
	InformationAssetRiskAssesmentType                                                    AS [risk_assessment_type],
	InformationAssetLinkToRiskAssessment                                                 AS [link_to_risk_assessment]

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[ims_information_asset_dim]
    	
GO
